programme.title: Naidheachdan Neònach CBBC ALBA
programme.desc: 2/2. Calum Macdonald introduces his personal highlights from the craziest news show on BBC ALBA!

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol...
programme.desc: ...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 49/52. The people of Grimsby believe the Twins are wise lifestyle gurus, able to predict what everyone wants before they know it themselves.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol...
programme.desc: ...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 50/52. Dave and his friends are given a lesson in responsibility when their school assigns them an animal each to look after overnight.

programme.title: Mach à Seo!
programme.desc: 4/8. Ramsay travels to the Moray and Aberdeenshire coasts for the ultimate weekend away. Ramsay a' lorg deireadh sheachdain sònraichte mu chladaichean Mhoireibh is Obar Dheathain.

programme.title: SpeakGaelic
programme.desc: 25/26. June Graham drops in on Joy in the studio, while Calum Maclean investigates the environmental properties of the peatland of Strath Halladale in northern Scotland.

programme.title: An Là
programme.desc: Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.

programme.title: Port an t-Òib
programme.desc: 1/6. We meet the Maclennan family, who run the Valhalla fishing boat, and there's a trip with the shepherds to the island of Pabbay.

programme.title: Leonardo da Vinci - Deisciobal...
programme.desc: ...an Eòlais/The Disciple of Experience. 2/4. Leonardo joins Duke Sforza's court and paints a monumental fresco.

programme.title: Skipinnish aig a' Chaisteal (Shorts)

programme.title: Julie Fowlis & Binneas | Kelvingrove
programme.desc: 2/2. Cuirm le Julie Fowlis & còisir Binneas aig Kelvingrove. Bho Celtic Connections 2024. A performance by Julie Fowlis & Binneas at Kelvingrove. From Celtic Connections 2024.

programme.title: Cocain is na Klondykers
programme.desc: 2/3. Journalist Anna MacLeod is on the trail of Operation Klondyke, the most expensive police and customs operation of the time. Contains scenes of drug use.

programme.title: Binneas - Na Trads
programme.desc: 3/8. Highland Young Musicians agus The Arc Fiddlers aig NaTrads, 2024. Concert set performed by Highland Young Musicians and The Arc Fiddlers, recorded live at the 2024 Trad Awards.

programme.title: Dàna | Scotland's Wild Side
programme.desc: 3/4. Coinneach Rankin travels to Torridon in both summer and winter to see what it can offer the mountaineer year-round.

programme.title: Alba Today

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programme.title: Treubh an Tuathanais (Big Barn Farm)
programme.desc: 20/20. Tha Muireall 'g iarraidh a dhol suas ann am bailiùn airson cuairt-adhair. Muireall wants to go in a balloon for a trip up in the sky.

programme.title: Boban is Fuigheag
programme.desc: 30/40. Dè idir tha Fuigheag a' feuchainn ri innse do Bhoban an-diugh? What's Fuigheag trying to tell Boban today?

programme.title: Sionnach agus Maigheach (Fox & Hare)
programme.desc: 13/26. Seal organises a swimming contest in the lake. Owl decides to sign up.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: 85/104. Tha Bing agus a charaidean a' tarraing dealbh dha Gilly. Bing and his friends are drawing a picture for Gilly.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: 86/104. Tha Bing aig Pàrtaidh Aodach-oidhch' aig taigh Sula agus tha e a' gabhail an eagail. Bing is at a Pyjama Party at Sula's house and he gets frightened.

programme.title: Pompon Am Mathan Beag/Pompon Little Bear
programme.desc: 22/39. Tha Pompon a' sealltainn a sgilean dhraoidheachd dha phàrantan 's iad uile anns a' choille. Pompon shows his parents magician skills while they are all in the woods.

programme.title: Stòiridh

programme.title: An Teaghlach Rìoghail an...

programme.title: An Teaghlach Rìoghail an...
programme.desc: ...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 16/52. Dè cho àbhaisteach 's a tha an Club Leabhair nuair a tha a' Bhànrigh ri tadhal? How normal is the Book Club when the Queen joins it?

programme.title: Clann Na Cruinne
programme.desc: 10/13. Tha Yushi ri spòrs-uisge gu math annasach far a bheil tòrr chleasan rin ionnsachadh. Yushi competes in a unique water sport that requires him to learn all sorts of tricks.

programme.title: Stri
programme.desc: 7/12. Tha Hannah a' farpais an aghaidh preasantairean CBBC ALBA ach saoil cò shoirbhicheas? Hannah competes against the CBBC ALBA presenters, but who will emerge victorious?

programme.title: Flix
programme.desc: 3/13. Tha pàrtaidh-oidhche dol a bhith aig Flix 's a charaidean. Saoil ciamar a thèid dhaibh? Flix and his friends are going to have a sleepover. How will they get on?

programme.title: Fuine

programme.desc: An investigation of the appeal and power of the popular song My Way, which was written by Paul Anka and recorded by many artists, including Frank Sinatra.

programme.title: Brussels, My Love?
programme.desc: From the economy to the climate and the EU's role in world affairs, this talk show sheds light on European affairs and the issues that impact on our daily lives as Europeans.

programme.title: Fresh
programme.desc: (2022) Adults only horror with Daisy Edgar-Jones. When date-weary Noa meets a guy in a supermarket, she thinks things are looking up. But he's oddly obsessed with not eating animals...

programme.title: The Riot Club
programme.desc: (2014) Dark drama about the members of an elite Oxford University drinking society. Starring Sam Claflin, Max Irons and Holliday Grainger. Sex/very strong language/drugs/violence.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: (1957) Classic western with Glenn Ford and Van Heflin. The capture of a murderous stagecoach robber propels an impoverished local rancher on a perilous journey. Directed by Delmer Daves.

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: (1948) Western. When a sadistic Union colonel (Glenn Ford) becomes a federal judge after the Civil War, his friend (William Holden) takes the deputy job to try and temper his actions.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Henry Cavill, Simon Pegg, Vanessa Kirby and director Christopher McQuarrie talk about making the sixth instalment in the thriller series.

programme.title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
programme.desc: (1949) This dark comedy from Ealing studios sees Alec Guinness take on the roles of eight characters, all the noble victims of a vengeance-seeking relative, played by Dennis Price.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: (1997) Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet star in James Cameron's Oscar-winning epic. Lovers from across the social divide meet on the doomed luxury liner.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: (2022) Action thriller with Chris Pine. An ex-soldier takes on private work to feed his family, but finds himself in dire straits (danger; not the band). With Kiefer Sutherland.

programme.title: How to Blow Up a Pipeline
programme.desc: (2022) High-octane eco-thriller. A disparate group of young Americans unite to disrupt the oil industry in an act motivated by everything from the ideological to the downright personal.

programme.title: Woman at War
programme.desc: (2018) Dark comedy with Halldóra Geirhardsdóttir. A choir teacher living in a small town in Iceland has a secret identity: 'Mountain Woman', a human-sized eco-superhero. In Icelandic/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Ten Tall Men
programme.desc: (1951) Comedy adventure. Burt Lancaster stars as a Foreign Legion sergeant leading nine men on a dangerous mission to prevent a Berber attack on a North African desert fort.

programme.title: Payroll
programme.desc: (1961) British crime thriller starring Billie Whitelaw. When Jackie's husband - an armoured van driver - is killed in a heist, she vows to unmask those responsible and take her revenge.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: (1954) Western starring Dana Andrews. A man falsely accused of murder gets a last-minute reprieve from the lynch mob so he can track down the real culprit.

programme.title: Born Free
programme.desc: (1966) Gem of a family drama based on a true story. After a life in captivity, can lioness Elsa learn to survive in the wild? Starring Virginia McKenna and John Barry's Oscar-winning score.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: (2019) Adventure comedy sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart and Karen Gillan. The old school pals enter the Jumanji video game again to save their friend.

programme.desc: (1962) Historical drama with Ralph Richardson. A retelling of the stand made at Thermopylae in 480 BC by a small Greek force against invasion by an enormous Persian army.

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: (1955) Atmospheric Victorian melodrama. Stewart Granger plays a sinister aristocrat who poisons his wife. However, his maid (Jean Simmons) knows his secret and tries to use it against him.

programme.title: Nothing But the Best
programme.desc: (1964) Classic British dark comedy with Alan Bates and Denholm Elliott. An ambitious estate agent's clerk hires a toff to teach him to be posh. Couldn't possibly lead to murder, could it?

programme.title: The Blue Lamp
programme.desc: (1950) Gritty noir thriller from Ealing Studios. A rookie PC hunts a vicious killer across blitz-battered London. With Jimmy Hanley, Dirk Bogarde and Jack Warner as PC George Dixon.

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: (1997) Action thriller starring Pierce Brosnan and Linda Hamilton. The inhabitants of a volcano-side resort unwisely ignore a scientist's warning about its imminent eruption.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: (2011) Thriller with Jason Statham and Donald Sutherland. A hitman is ordered to kill his mentor, but then takes on the dead man's son as an apprentice. Could get complicated... and deadly.

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: (2015) Sin City thriller with Jason Statham. A compulsive gambler who does favours for money just wants out of the Vegas life. Just one big win at the tables should do it...

programme.title: Good Luck to You, Leo Grande
programme.desc: (2022) Drama starring Emma Thompson as a recently widowed, retired teacher who has a sexual bucket list she wants to get around to now that she has the time and, perhaps, even the energy.

programme.title: Fresh
programme.desc: (2022) Adults only horror with Daisy Edgar-Jones. When date-weary Noa meets a guy in a supermarket, she thinks things are looking up. But he's oddly obsessed with not eating animals...

programme.desc: Ford 100E/Ford Escort MK1: Derek is reunited with the vehicle he took his driving test in - a 1957 Ford 100E Estate. Dave is also on the trail for an Escort, this time a 1970s Mk1 twin cam.

programme.desc: Kielder Forest to Edinburgh: Michael Portillo is in Northumbria, discovering what lay behind a national initiative to plant one of the largest manmade woodlands in Europe.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Falkirk to Dundee: Michael Portillo reaches the Westerglen Transmitting Station in Falkirk, before visiting Gleneagles and Berry Town on route to the city of Dundee.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Dundee to Aberdeen: Michael Portillo travels from Dundee to Aberdeen, stopping off at Glamis Castle, where the Queen Mother grew up, and making an excursion into the Eastern Highlands.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Elgin to Loch Ness: Michael Portillo visits Lossiemouth and Inverness. His journey ends at Loch Ness, where he joins a Deep Scan research team searching for the elusive monster.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Austin 7 Chummy/Triumph TR4A: Derek picks up a lovingly restored 1925 Calthorpe motorbike that he thinks is more of a work of art than anything ever produced by Picasso.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Volvo P1800/Morris Milk Float: Dave gets wind of a possible free lunch at the officers' mess when he heads off to collect a stylish Swedish Volvo P1800S from an RAF base in the Midlands.

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: Hitler's Birthday: At the end of March 1945, with Germany's Army depleted and Hitler's circle of trust shrinking, he invites a group of Hitler Youth to the Reich Chancellery.

programme.desc: Durham Cathedral 2: Fiona Bruce presents from Durham Cathedral, where finds include a carriage clock, an early drawing by Laura Knight, and a 19th-century missionary's medical kit.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The Royal William Yard: Fiona Bruce presents from the Royal William Yard in Plymouth where eyes are cast over Lord Nelson's doorknobs, and a diamond necklace the length of a skipping rope.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Jowett Javelin/Ford Escort: Derek dives into the lost Jowett marque, as a 1952 Javelin finds an unexpected home. Paul and Dave find a Ford Escort that's been untouched for 30 years.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Bond Bug/Jag MK2: A 1970s Bond Bug three-wheeler divides opinion among Mathewsons customers, while a retired engineer reluctantly auctions off his father's treasured 60s Jaguar Mark 2.

programme.desc: Simon O'Brien finds a barn containing a collection of replica Rolls-Royce cars, and Henry Cole tries his hand at driving a tractor as they continue their money-making tour.
